Package com.github.dandyvica.jrof

Class FieldType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandyvica.jrof.Atom
      • com.github.dandyvica.jrof.FieldType
  • public class FieldType
extends Atom
    Each field within a record-oriented file has a type, which is defined in the XML layout file and associated with each field.
